data.text:
Excellent hotel! Had a nice stay with family and friends. 
Very great food, a lot of dietary options to choose. Great animators and a lot of nice experiences to have. Huge territory of hotel to explore and a lot of pools around, so everyone can find their place to stay!
data.title: Amphoras Hotel / Our Stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Warm Greetings,
Thank you for being our guest and for your review. It was a pleasure to meet and serve you, and we look forward to seeing you again.
Best Regards,Hotel administration
owner_response.author: Hotel  Management

data.text:
It was so good! Animators was really cool and kind. I like food and atmosphere here, everything beautiful and clean. Our room was clean as well and look really nice. 
Highly recommend restaurant Bella vista (it is located in Hotel area) really good food and waiters.
data.title: my vacation

owner_response.title: Owner response

data.text:
This is a nice hotel, enough swimming pools and a nice garden which is treated with care. The bedroom was very modern and always nicely cleaned. Don’t know his name but he cleaned room 4239 very nicely and took his time to make something on the bed with flowers! Furthermore, the food was nice but we experienced that the food was beter at noon then at night in terms of choice. But the service we got in the restaurant by Yosry was amazing! Very friendly man who gives you some tips to do when you would want to hear. Also Sayed, the lifeguard at the swimming pool was very nice and friendly. Always ready to help you and greets you with a smile every morning. Last but not least, the 2 young man at the Panorama Bar at night had an amazing service. Very friendly and always a smile on their face! To conclude, we had an amazing stay here! Only thing is that there is a lot of Italian and Russian people, which we actually didn’t mind because they weren’t as loud as we experienced in the past. They don’t see Belgians coming to the hotel but can really recommend this hotel! 

But BE CAREFUL with the reviews on Booking.com. The hotel puts reviews in your name, without you giving consent! This is problematic and just falsifying information. This left a bit of a bitter taste after our nice vacation here, so to the hotel: Stop doing this as you will get nice comments from people because it is a nice place to go too.
data.title: Nice stay at Amphoras Beach!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Hello!
Thank you for taking the time to leave a comment about your stay at AMPHORAS BEACH RESORT! It's nice to know that you appreciated the advantages of the hotel and especially noted the work of the staff.
We will be very glad to the next meeting!
With respect and best wishes, Hotel Administration
owner_response.author: Hotel  Management

data.text:
Where to start … 
After reading all this great reviews for this hotel I have decided to book but unfortunately this wasn’t great choice! 
We arrive quiet late evening with a little baby  we have ask for a baby cot on our reservation unfortunately wasn’t in the room they have promised to deliver to the room we have been waiting forever…
We had a two bedroom chalet , rooms are very dirty and old furniture but the worst was the kitchen ( sink very dirty, fridge never been clean after previous guest, plus the floor  very dirty ) I have to stelerise the baby bottles and store baby food but the condition of the kitchen was shocking . 
I have to clean fridge first to be able to store a baby food. 
Food in breakfast lunch and dinner wasn’t better either all the time this same no any flavour plus we got bread on the breakfast with mould! Staff in the restaurant very not friendly.
Swimming pool with slide close from 12-3 which is  very strange to close the most entertaining place for children at this time of the day . Just the beach had beautiful coral reef and 1 heated pool which we spend most of the time .Hotel is just for Russian tourists which they are behaving disgusting especially on the buffets and nobody from the staff is reacting plus all the entertainment or shows is most in Russian language 
Unfortunately I can’t recommend this hotel and we won’t be back again !
data.title: Poor standard of the hotel horrible food in restaurants!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Value Guest!
Thank you for your review and feedback about you recent stay at Amphoras Beach Resort. We are sorry to hear you feel this way and please accept our apology for any inconvenience you have experienced. Please email us for more details grelation.amphoras@ amphorashotels.com , we want to help improve your stay at our hotel .We passed all your comments to concerned departments in order to take actions and make improvements.
 Best regards, Hotel Management
owner_response.author: Hotel  Management

data.text: I liked this hotel. We vacationed there with friends for several days and were pleasantly surprised. Well-groomed, clean territory, a lot of greenery, friendly staff, very cheerful and friendly animators. The rooms are clean and spacious. Great hotel for this price
data.title: Everything was good

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear  Value Guest,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Thank you so much for taking time to share your experience. It is wonderful that you enjoyed your stay at Amphoras Beach Resort. We are looking forward to your future stays. 
Best regards,Hotel administration
